item.title: Setup
item.description: What does the author have? I have: a 2017 HP laptop running Windows 10 Home edition (64-bit) i5 Intel processor 8 GB of RAM I have also enabled virtualization in my BIOS (necessary) and have WSL2 enabled (not necessary, but convenient for me) VirtualBox Install VirtualBox from here Follow along with this tutorial to familiarize yourself with Virtualbox Ubuntu 18.04 Server Download Ubuntu 18.

item.title: Network
item.description: Ethernet I have an ethernet cable Virtualbox Network Setting Details â†• After turning your VM off, go to settings. Under Network configure the following: Adapter 1: Bridged Adapter, Realteck PCIe GbE Family Controller #2 Don’t use Intel (R) Dualband Wireless-AC 3168 if you use Bridged Adapter with an ethernet cable Configure static IP From the article How to configure static ip address on Ubuntu (Linuxize), read the paragraph under “Configuring Static IP address using DHCP”
